DOC.brief_summary: The U.S. food beverage industry recently release new front-of-package nutrition label system call Facts Up Front use thousand food product . The purpose study test consumer understanding Facts Up Front nutrition label system compare Multiple Traffic Light system ( Traffic Light ) . Facts Up Front display grams/milligrams % daily value information various nutrient ; Traffic Light use interpretive color-coded scheme alert consumer low , medium high level certain nutrient . Participants Internet-based study randomize one five front-of-package label condition : 1 ) No Label ; 2 ) Traffic Light ; 3 ) Traffic Light plus information protein fiber ( Traffic Light+ ) ; 4 ) Facts Up Front ; 5 ) Facts Up Front plus information `` nutrient encourage '' ( Facts Up Front+ ) . Total percentage correct quiz score generate reflect participant ' ability compare two food nutrient level , base label , estimate amount saturate fat , sugar , sodium , fiber protein food . 703 adult participant recruit online database May 2011 participate Internet-based study data analyze June 2011 . The investigator hypothesize Traffic Light label group would perform good Facts Up Front group outcomes .
